description: This file defines a Flutter widget `RecordsScreen` representing a UI screen for displaying medical records, along with a placeholder widget `_RecordPlaceholder` for individual record entries. It includes layout and styling code using Flutter's Material library.

classes.name: RecordsScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a list of medical records with some placeholders.

classes.name: _RecordPlaceholder
classes.description: A private stateless widget representing a placeholder for a medical record item in the list.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for `RecordsScreen` and `_RecordPlaceholder` widgets.
